title: What Are the Possible Causes of an Upgrade Failure？
answer:
The possible causes are as follows:
1、During the upgrade, your phone is powered off or the microSD card is removed.
2、When you upgrade the software of your phone from the microSD card, the upgrade file is saved to an incorrect folder. The upgrade file must be saved in the dload folder.
3、The upgrade version is incorrect. You must use the correct version for the phone.
      After an upgrade failure, you can perform a forced upgrade on your phone. For details, see section 6.4 "How Can I Perform a Forced Upgrade?"
